title: Spicy Indian masoor dhal
ingredients: ['200g (7 oz) red lentils', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon mustard seeds', '3 onions, chopped', '2 tablespoons minced root ginger', '3 green chillies, seeded and minced (or to taste)', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon ground coriander seed', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '4 tomatoes, chopped', '225ml (8 fl oz) water', 'salt to taste', 'handful chopped fresh coriander']
